snippet: Tens of thousands of low-income people have been prevented from signing up for Medicaid even though they are eligible, federal and state officials say.
abstract: Problems with the federal health insurance Web site have prevented tens of thousands of low-income people from signing up for Medicaid even though they are eligible, undermining one of the chief goals of the 2010 health care law.
lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of low-income people have been prevented from signing up for Medicaid even though they are eligible, federal and state officials say.

headline.main: Problems With Federal Health Portal Also Stymie Medicaid Enrollment
